alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 07 at 7:54AM PDT until July 08 at 7:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 7 AM PDT SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained west to northwest winds 20 to 30 mph, with gusts near 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...Valid from 5 PM PDT this afternoon until 7 AM PDT Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
